snippet.title: Uncover the Smoking Gun - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Get another look at the world, your objectives, and more from Uncover the Smoking Gun, a detective adventure game coming to PC on June 24, 2024.

In Uncover the Smoking Gun, find clues and dissect evidence, but don't stop there. Engage with suspects, where even the trivial unravels the truth. Watch information converge into surprising revelations. Are you ready to solve the mystery?
